subdisciplines.name: Colonial Art of Latin America
subdisciplines.description: The study of the art and architecture of Latin America during the period of colonial rule by Spain and Portugal.

subdisciplines.name: Modern Art of Latin America
subdisciplines.description: The study of art produced in Latin America during the 19th and 20th centuries.

subdisciplines.name: Contemporary Art of Latin America
subdisciplines.description: The study of art produced in Latin America since the mid-20th century to the present day.
